title: Script- Curly O
content:
The "O" seems like it would be English Schoolbook, but it doesn't match up with the rest of the letters. Any ideas?

Font: 

 Hogarth Script 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171222/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")

author: cristalmt

comments.content:
Best guess = Ambassador Script that someone manually "condensed" and "italicised."

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ambassador-script/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171222/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ambassador-script/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/canadatype/ambassador-script/")
